item.title: What to buy and avoid at upcoming Labor Day weekend sales
item.description: Many people don't head out to shop on Labor Day weekend, but it's really a great time to find deals on things for around the home. Many people don't head out to shop on Labor Day weekend, but it's really a great time to find deals on things for around the home.

item.title: Paralympic triathlon events are postponed because of poor water quality in the Seine River
item.description: Paralympic triathlon competitions in Paris scheduled for Sunday have been postponed because of concerns about water quality in the Seine River after heavy rainfall, organizers said. Paralympic triathlon competitions in Paris scheduled for Sunday have been postponed because of concerns about water quality in the Seine River after heavy rainfall, organizers said.

item.title: Caught on camera: Car crashes into Phoenix house near 39th Avenue and Thomas Road
item.description: Just as a Valley couple was sitting down for dinner Friday night, a car crashed into their house. Just as a Valley couple was sitting down for dinner Friday night, a car crashed into their house.
